newsitem.title: FINLAND: Konecranes says management sold shares.
newsitem.headline: Konecranes says management sold shares.

text.p: Finnish cranes maker KCI Konecranes International Oy said in a statement on Tuesday seven senior executives and members of CEO Stig Gustavson's family had sold a total of 340,000 shares, or 2.3 percent of all shares.
Gustavson himself had not sold shares in the company, Konecranes said.

"The 340,000 shares sold ... represent 2.3 percent of the total number of shares in KCI Konecranes," it said, adding its top executives and their families still owned 4.6 percent of the company's shares.
